attributes.action: To provide covid tests for families so they are able to go into care homes.
attributes.additional_details:
Let's get this changed in time for Christmas. 

My nan is one of many who long to see their loved ones.
attributes.background:
I want the government to provide covid tests so all residents in care homes can have a key person from their family to be able to go into the care homes and see their loved ones. 
Many of these residents haven't seen a loved one for months, nor have they had that physical contact they long for.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, the Government has announced a pilot scheme to provide testing to relatives of care home residents. It is planned that this scheme will then be rolled out nationally in December: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/pilot-for-family-members-to-get-regular-testing-for-safer-care-home-visits

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
